mapper.select: select count(1) from family_authorization where execute_flag = 0 and end_time <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') limit 1
select fa.id,fa.family_id from family_authorization as fa where fa.execute_flag = 0 and fa.end_time <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
